sentence.Network_en: It took him ten seconds to scrape his disjoined remains together again.
sentence.Network_cn: 有十秒钟的工夫,他惊魂始定.

sentence.Network_en: As part of the installation process, this server was disjoined from its domain.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为安装过程的一部分, 此服务器会从所属域中退出.

sentence.Network_en: As part of the promotion process, this server was disjoined from its domain.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为升级的过程, 这台服务器会从所属域中退出.
